channel.title: Omg I am a noob at this server making
channel.description:
Ok so I downloaded Jdk 6.0 and 7zip along with testscape. I extracted the testcape thing already and have everything.
Now what do I do? How can I name my server and customize it and get it to where I made it, instead of it being the standard testscape thing that says.
"Welcome to Testscape" once you log in.
I want mine different.
please help! how do i log into MY server.? :confused:

item.title: Omg I am a noob at this server making
item.dc:creator: @jma0710 jma0710
item.description:
@jma0710 wrote:

ok to log into your server:
1)load mopar client
2)go inot your server file and click run
3) make the ip on the mopar client; localhost, 127.0.0.1,or 0.0.0.0
4)input you desired username and password
5)click log in

Read full topic
item.source: Omg I am a noob at this server making

item.title: Omg I am a noob at this server making
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

To change the server name go into Client.Java
Hit CTRL+H
In the first box type “testscape”
In the second box type what your server name is
Click “Replace All”

Read full topic

item.title: Omg I am a noob at this server making
item.dc:creator: @kilopy kilopy
item.description:
@kilopy wrote:

ok really u need to no the bassics of java coding

but if you want your name changed do this:

type ctrl and f in client java (clients the file in ur server)

and put in if your using testscape type:
Testscape

every time it finds test scape cha nge to ur s erver name.

or you can go to file and press replace and type Testscape in topbox and ur server name in bottom and press replace

hope it helped a bit :):):):
